item.title: Senate passes bill to end government shutdown, sending it to House
item.description: The deal does not include extend enhanced ACA tax credits, which had been the key demand by most Democrats since the government shutdown began Oct. 1.

item.title: U.S. and Switzerland working on a deal to slash 39% tariffs
item.description: Switzerland's key exports include watches, jewelry, machinery, chocolate, and pharmaceutical products.

item.title: Trump backs Senate deal that would end government shutdown

item.title: What Democrats are — and aren't — getting in the deal that could end the government shutdown
item.description: The pending government funding deal includes a guarantee from Republican leadership that the Senate will soon vote on a Democrat-drafted health care b...

item.title: American farmers push to boost soybean sales in China as Trump's trade war rumbles on
item.description: China lifted retaliatory tariffs on some agricultural products after the meeting between U.S. President Donald Trump and Chinese President Xi Jinping.
